name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Amazon reviews exporter | images & CSV & XLSX

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download Amazon product reviews. Export comments, ratings, images, videos and so on to CSV or XLSX format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download Amazon product reviews to your computer. Export comments, ratings, images, videos and so on.
Export Amazon product reviews to CSV or XLSX format.

# Getting Started
1. Install the extension by clicking the “Add to chrome” button.
2. Open an Amazon product page.
3. Open the extension and start downloading
4. Export reviews to CSV or XLSX

# Features
1.Download product reviews to CSV or XLSX
2.Include reviews images and videos info
3.Sort by most recent
4.Filter by keywords
5.Filter by stars rating
6.All reviews filters

# It's free?
Yes, Amazon Reviews Exporter is free.
